document_data.name: Elemental Weevil
document_data.mainbody: '''Elemental weevils''' were extremely rare tiny [[elemental]] [[insects]] native to the plane of [[Elemental Chaos]].
document_data.Description: Relatively harmless, elemental weevils were hot to the touch and appeared as tiny smoldering creatures that left charred tracks in their wake. They could be easily contained within a glass bottle.
document_data.History: During the years of [[Spellplague]], elemental weevils could be found on the slopes of [[Mount Hotenow]]. Following the mount's [[Ruining|volcanic explosion]], in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the tiny ember creatures could be found within [[Neverwinter]]'s [[Neverwinter/River District|River District]]. During that time, [[Riftel Farsight]] was researching the creatures, sending her apprentice [[Gerad Kinesward]] into the [[orc]]-ravaged district to collect the insects for her.
